name: Toi Acid Game
storyline:
Toi, our nice protagonist, has Zoi as his girlfriend, a beautiful little doll. 
 
One day, while at the disco, a crazy-looking guy tears Toi from the lips of his sweet doll. 
 
Carai, what a face that one has! ... Hey, you, crazy! And the madman responds: Follow me if you can, egg face! 
 
Toi ran after him, they were taking his favorite girl! And he couldn't tolerate that.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Toi Acid Game (Iber Software/Genesis Soft) (1989) (Atari ST) (Unreleased)
